command.program:
check_samplesheet.py \
        samplesheet.csv \
        samplesheet.valid.csv

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_SMRNASEQ:SMRNASEQ:INPUT_CHECK:SAMPLESHEET_CHECK":
        python: $(python --version | sed 's/Python //g')
    END_VERSIONS

# Uncompress FASTA reference files if necessary
    FASTA="mature.fa"
    if [ ${FASTA: -3} == ".gz" ]; then
        gunzip -f $FASTA
        FASTA=${FASTA%%.gz}
    fi
    # Remove spaces from miRBase FASTA files
    # sed -i 's, ,_,g' $FASTA
    sed '/^[^>]/s/[^AUGCaugc]/N/g' $FASTA > ${FASTA}_parsed.fa
    # TODO perl -ane 's/[ybkmrsw]/N/ig;print;' ${FASTA}_parsed_tmp.fa > ${FASTA}_parsed.fa

    sed -i 's/ .*//' ${FASTA}_parsed.fa
    seqkit grep -r --pattern ".*hsa-.*" ${FASTA}_parsed.fa > ${FASTA}_sps.fa
    seqkit seq --rna2dna ${FASTA}_sps.fa > ${FASTA}_igenome.fa

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    NFCORE_SMRNASEQ:SMRNASEQ:MIRNA_QUANT:PARSE_MATURE":
        seqkit: $(echo $(seqkit 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*Version: //; s/ .*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

# Uncompress FASTA reference files if necessary
    FASTA="hairpin.fa"
    if [ ${FASTA: -3} == ".gz" ]; then
        gunzip -f $FASTA
        FASTA=${FASTA%%.gz}
    fi
    # Remove spaces from miRBase FASTA files
    # sed -i 's, ,_,g' $FASTA
    sed '/^[^>]/s/[^AUGCaugc]/N/g' $FASTA > ${FASTA}_parsed.fa
    # TODO perl -ane 's/[ybkmrsw]/N/ig;print;' ${FASTA}_parsed_tmp.fa > ${FASTA}_parsed.fa

    sed -i 's/ .*//' ${FASTA}_parsed.fa
    seqkit grep -r --pattern ".*hsa-.*" ${FASTA}_parsed.fa > ${FASTA}_sps.fa
    seqkit seq --rna2dna ${FASTA}_sps.fa > ${FASTA}_igenome.fa

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    NFCORE_SMRNASEQ:SMRNASEQ:MIRNA_QUANT:PARSE_HAIRPIN":
        seqkit: $(echo $(seqkit 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*Version: //; s/ .*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

# Remove any special base characters from reference genome FASTA file
    sed '/^[^>]/s/[^ATGCatgc]/N/g' genome.fa > genome.edited.fa
    sed -i 's/ .*//' genome.edited.fa

    # Build bowtie index
    bowtie-build genome.edited.fa genome --threads 1

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_SMRNASEQ:SMRNASEQ:GENOME_QUANT:INDEX_GENOME":
        bowtie: $(echo $(bowtie --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*bowtie-align-s version //; s/ .*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

fasta_formatter -w 0 -i mature.fa_igenome.fa -o mature.fa_igenome.fa_idx.fa

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_SMRNASEQ:SMRNASEQ:MIRNA_QUANT:FORMAT_MATURE":
        fastx_toolkit:  $(echo "0.0.14")
    END_VERSIONS

fasta_formatter -w 0 -i hairpin.fa_igenome.fa -o hairpin.fa_igenome.fa_idx.fa

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_SMRNASEQ:SMRNASEQ:MIRNA_QUANT:FORMAT_HAIRPIN":
        fastx_toolkit:  $(echo "0.0.14")
    END_VERSIONS

bowtie-build mature.fa_igenome.fa_idx.fa fasta_bidx --threads 1

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_SMRNASEQ:SMRNASEQ:MIRNA_QUANT:INDEX_MATURE":
        bowtie: $(echo $(bowtie --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*bowtie-align-s version //; s/ .*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

bowtie-build hairpin.fa_igenome.fa_idx.fa fasta_bidx --threads 1

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml

        bowtie: $(echo $(bowtie --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*bowtie-align-s version //; s/ .*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

[ ! -f  Clone1_N3.fastq.gz ] && ln -s C1-N3-R1_S6_L001_R1_001.fastq.gz Clone1_N3.fastq.gz
        fastqc --quiet --threads 1 Clone1_N3.fastq.gz

        cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
        "NFCORE_SMRNASEQ:SMRNASEQ:FASTQC_FASTP:FASTQC_RAW":
            fastqc: $( fastqc --version | sed -e "s/FastQC v//g" )
        END_VERSIONS

[ ! -f  Clone1_N3.fastq.gz ] && ln -sf C1-N3-R1_S6_L001_R1_001.fastq.gz Clone1_N3.fastq.gz

        fastp \
            --stdout \
            --in1 Clone1_N3.fastq.gz \
            --out1  Clone1_N3.fastp.fastq.gz \
            --thread 1 \
            --json Clone1_N3.fastp.json \
            --html Clone1_N3.fastp.html \
             \
            -l 17 --max_len1 40  --adapter_fasta /home/kyle/.nextflow/assets/nf-core/smrnaseq/assets/known_adapters.fa \
            2> Clone1_N3.fastp.log

        cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
        "NFCORE_SMRNASEQ:SMRNASEQ:FASTQC_FASTP:FASTP":
            fastp: $(fastp --version 2>&1 | sed -e "s/fastp //g")
        END_VERSIONS

[ ! -f  Clone1_N3.fastq.gz ] && ln -s Clone1_N3.fastp.fastq.gz Clone1_N3.fastq.gz
        fastqc --quiet --threads 1 Clone1_N3.fastq.gz

        cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
        "NFCORE_SMRNASEQ:SMRNASEQ:FASTQC_FASTP:FASTQC_TRIM":
            fastqc: $( fastqc --version | sed -e "s/FastQC v//g" )
        END_VERSIONS

INDEX=`find -L ./ -name "*.3.ebwt" | sed 's/.3.ebwt//'`
    bowtie \
        -x $INDEX \
        -q <(zcat Clone1_N3.fastp.fastq.gz) \
        -p 1 \
        -t \
        -k 50 \
        --best \
        --strata \
        -e 99999 \
        --chunkmbs 2048 \
        --un Clone1_N3_mature_unmapped.fq -S > Clone1_N3_mature.sam

    samtools view -bS Clone1_N3_mature.sam > Clone1_N3_mature.bam

    if [ ! -f  "Clone1_N3_mature_unmapped.fq" ]
    then
        touch Clone1_N3_mature_unmapped.fq
    fi
    gzip Clone1_N3_mature_unmapped.fq
    mkdir unmapped
    mv  Clone1_N3_mature_unmapped.fq.gz  unmapped/.

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_SMRNASEQ:SMRNASEQ:MIRNA_QUANT:BOWTIE_MAP_MATURE":
        bowtie: $(echo $(bowtie --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*bowtie-align-s version //; s/ .*$//')
        samtools: $(echo $(samtools --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*samtools //; s/Using.*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

seqcluster collapse -f Clone1_N3.fastp.fastq.gz -m 1 --min_size 15 -o collapsed
    gzip collapsed/*_trimmed.fastq
    mkdir final
    mv collapsed/*.fastq.gz final/.

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    NFCORE_SMRNASEQ:SMRNASEQ:MIRNA_QUANT:SEQCLUSTER_SEQUENCES":
        seqcluster: $(echo $(seqcluster --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*seqcluster //')
    END_VERSIONS

export mirtracejar=$(dirname $(which mirtrace))
    for i in C1-N3-R1_S6_L001_R1_001.fastq.gz
    do
        path=$(realpath ${i})
        prefix=$(echo ${i} | sed -e 's/.gz//' -e 's/.fastq//' -e 's/.fq//' -e 's/_val_1//' -e 's/_trimmed//' -e 's/_R1//' -e 's/.R1//')
        echo $path","$prefix
    done > mirtrace_config

    java -Xms6442450944 -Xmx6442450944 -jar $mirtracejar/mirtrace.jar --mirtrace-wrapper-name mirtrace qc  \
        --species hsa \
         \
        --protocol illumina \
        --config mirtrace_config \
        --write-fasta \
        --output-dir mirtrace \
        --force

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    NFCORE_SMRNASEQ:SMRNASEQ:MIRTRACE:MIRTRACE_RUN":
        mirtrace: $(echo $(mirtrace -v 2>&1))
    END_VERSIONS
